GSD.description:
efi: Do not import certificates from UEFI Secure Boot for T2 Macs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit c072cab98bac11f6ef9db640fb51834d9552e2e6. For more details please see the references link.
